document.full_text: chancellor angela merkel's conservatives lost power in a regional stronghold on sunday, with early poll results showing the greens, buoyed by japan's nuclear crisis, surging to their first state premiership.
document.title: merkel's party loses power in rich german state
lines_and_colors: chancellor angela merkel's conservatives lost power in a regional stronghold on sunday, with early poll results showing the greens, buoyed by japan's nuclear crisis, surging to their first state premiership.
